titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for adjourning the Parliament, to the twenty seventh of March. At Edinburgh, the fifteenth day of March, one thousand six hundred ninety years.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Eliot, Gilbert, Sir, 1651-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order of the Privy Council,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
